title: Excellent Location near Piedmont Park
posting_body: Fresh paint, professionally cleaned and ready to move in.
Fantastic 2nd floor unit, this lovely 1 bed 1 bath has become available to rent.

Just a couple of blocks from Piedmont Park, the Belt Line, Trader Joe's, Restaurants, & Movie Featuring hardwood floors, spacious living area , fully fitted kitchen with granite counters and ss appliances.
plenty of storage space, sun room can be used as office or guest bedroom.
Water, sewage and garbage included in the rent.
Google Fiber installed in the unit.
Please contact Bobby for a showing for any day..
Possible Open House on Saturday, July 30 from 2:00 - 4:00 PM.
This apartment will be rented by Sunday so hurry.
For pictures, please view Zillow or Hot Pad
